body_html:
OK, I get it, maybe we can explicitly name this version as *_cudnn as in Lasagne.
Come back to the CUDA version, after a quick through of the functions LSTMFused_updateOutput and LSTM_forw_ind_wrap, I couldn't figure out where the actual LSTM calculation is done. Please correct me if I'm wrong, I know nothing about CUDA programming.

body:
OK, I get it, maybe we can explicitly name this version as `*_cudnn` as in Lasagne. 
Come back to the CUDA version, after a quick through of the functions `LSTMFused_updateOutput` and `LSTM_forw_ind_wrap`, I couldn't figure out where the actual LSTM calculation is done. Please correct me if I'm wrong, I know nothing about CUDA programming.
